name: Marvel Heroes Omega - Age of Apocalypse Event Omega Pack
name_original: Marvel Heroes Omega - Age of Apocalypse Event Omega Pack
description:
AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY!

Omega Prestige marks the culmination of a hero’s journey. Purchase this Age of Apocalypse Event Omega Pack to bypass the standard Prestige process and unlock Omega Prestige Rank 1 for Jean Grey, Magik, Psylocke, and Storm!

Exclusive Omega Prestige benefits include two brand new traits, Ultimate cooldown reduction, double Hero Synergy benefits, Legendary Item, Flourish, Omega Prestige visual effect, and Omega Prestige nameplate.

This special pack also includes ultra-rare Apocalypse Event themed Enhanced costumes for each hero, which include a brand new power unique to each costume!

Pack includes:

Jean Grey with Omega Prestige Unlock
Magik with Omega Prestige Unlock
Psylocke with Omega Prestige Unlock
Storm with Omega Prestige Unlock
Jean Grey Apocalypse Event Enhanced Costume
Magik Apocalypse Event Enhanced Costume
Psylocke Apocalypse Event Enhanced Costume
Storm Apocalypse Event Enhanced Costume
8,000 Gs
10X Combination Boosts

1-2 players
Network Players 2-99
DUALSHOCK®4

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
